# CPListItemPlayingIndicatorLocation

**Enumeration**

The locations where a list item can display the Now Playing indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CPListItemPlayingIndicatorLocation
```

## Overview

Use these constants to set the value of a list item’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListItem/playingIndicatorLocation] property. When you set a list item’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListItem/isPlaying] property to `true`, it uses the specified location to position the Now Playing indicator.

## Now Playing Indicator Locations

- **CPListItemPlayingIndicatorLocation.leading**: Align the Now Playing indicator with the leading edge of the list item.
- **CPListItemPlayingIndicatorLocation.trailing**: Align the Now Playing indicator with the trailing edge of the list item.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing Playback Information

- **isExplicitContent**: A Boolean value that determines whether the list item displays its explicit content indicator.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that determines whether the list item displays its Now Playing indicator.
- **playingIndicatorLocation**: The location where the list item displays its Now Playing indicator.
- **playbackProgress**: The playback progress status for the content that the list item represents.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
